void CNAnalysisMethodCN::hmm ( const std::vector< int > &  position,
const VecCNLR &  samplr,
std::vector< int > &  state,
const std::vector< double > &  priorProb,
const std::vector< double > &  mu,
const std::vector< double > &  sigma,
double  transMatDecay,
const std::string &  stateEstMethod,
std::vector< double > &  stateMargProb,
const unsigned int  emIterations,
const double  emConvergenceThresh,
bool  b_allelespecific,
int  normalState 
) [protected]

Runs HMM algorithm on a set of log2 ratios for a given sample on a given chromosome.

Performs the CopyNumber algorithm on log2 ratios of a sample on a per chromosome basis.

Note: currently, only "state" will be used outside this method.

Note: Currently only states will be used after calling this but in the future this may change.

Parameters:
position - SNP positions.
samplr - Sample log2 ratios.
state - in/out: CN states.
priorProb - in/out: Prior probabilities.
mu - in/out: Mu values.
sigma - in/out: Sigma values.
transMatDecay - Transition decay matrix.
stateEstMethod - State estimation method.
stateMargProb - State marginal probability (may be modified in future).
emIterations - Number of EM iterations.
emConvergenceThresh - EM convergence threshold.
b_allelespecific -
normalState - The normal copy number state (user specified).

void CNAnalysisMethodCN::postProcessHMM ( const std::vector< std::vector< int > > &  state,
const VecVecCNLR &  logRatio,
int  normalState,
int  normalStateMinObservations,
bool  estCorrectionFactor,
double &  correctionFactor,
VecVecCNLR &  medianCN 
) [protected]

This is done across all chromosomes for a given sample.

The indexes for the "vector< vector<TYPE> >" items are [chromosome][state/log2ratio/medianCN/pValue] Example: For chromosome index 2 the 5th log2 ratio values would be "samplr[2][4]"

The indexes for the "vector< vector<TYPE> >" items are [chromosome][state/log2ratio/medianCN/pValue] Example: For chromosome index 2 the 5th log2 ratio values would be "samplr[2][4]"

Parameters:
state - in/out: CN states.
logRatio - Log2 ratios for all SNPs and all chromosomes.
normalState - The normal copy number state (user specified).
normalStateMinObservations - Minimum number of observations for the normal state.
estCorrectionFactor -
correctionFactor -
medianCN - Median copy number values for all chromosomes.
